es.api

Interface ExpertSystem

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ExpertSystemImpl

    public interface ExpertSystem
    Expert System (ES).

    • Method Detail

      • think

        java.util.Set<Recommendation> think()
        Makes the ES think.
        Returns:
        the Set of Recommendations activated as a result of thinking.
        See Also:
        think(boolean)

      • think

        java.util.Set<Recommendation> think(boolean generateRule)
        Continuously iterates through the read Rules, checking Facts and Recommendations, and activating Rules if possible.

        Stops once the system reaches natural quiescence and generates a new rule.

        Parameters:
        generateRule - if true generates the new rule proven by a think cycle
        Returns:
        the activated Recommendations as a result of thinking

      • think

        java.util.Set<Recommendation> think(boolean generateRule,
                                    int numberOfCycles)
        Makes the ES think for a fixed number of cycles. The number of cycles represents how much effort is being put into thinking. Each cycle is a run-through of all the ready Rules, activating Rules if possible. Note that a Rule that is activated in a cycle is not iterated over in that same cycle, and must wait until the next cycle to cascade further activation. This is threshold quiescence, which may or may not correspond with natural quiescence. Generates a new rule.
        Parameters:
        generateRule - if true generates the new rule proven by a think cycle
        numberOfCycles - the number of cycles to think for
        Returns:
        the activated Recommendations as a result of thinking

      • teach

        void teach(java.lang.String sentence)
        Generates rules from a natural language sentence

        NB: Sentences must contain one token from {"if", "when", "while", "first"}, and one token from {"then", "next", "do"}, to denote input facts and output predicates respectively.

        e.g. "If Human(near) Then Move(steps=10)"

        Parameters:
        sentence - that contains input and output delimiters

      • rest

        void rest(int numberOfCycles)
        Process that occurs when ES is not thinking.

        Currently calls addReadyRule to merge rules

        Parameters:
        numberOfCycles - the number of rest cycles

      • reset

        void reset()
        Resets the ES by clearing all Rules, Recommendations, and Facts.

      • deactivateRules

        void deactivateRules()
        Deactivates all active Rules.

        Parameters:

      • addTag

        boolean addTag(Tag tag)
        Adds a Tag to the ES. Will cast the tag to either a Rule, a Fact, or a Recommendation.
        Parameters:
        tag - the Tag to be added
        Returns:
        true if the Tag is successfully added

        Returns:
